report.name: fe65

userParameter.name: P_PERIODE
userParameter.comment: Sert à afficher l'entete : "PERIODE DU dd/mm/yyyy AU dd/mm/yyyy"

dataSource.name: Q_fe65
dataSource.select: -- 1 Factures enregistrees avec contrat SELECT si.coddep dc_coddep, si.coddeppole dc_coddeppole, count(*) dc_nbenr, 0 dc_nbreg, 0 dc_nbsanscont, 0 dc_nbfactattper, 0 dc_nbfactatt, 0 dc_nbfacannper, 0 dc_facann FROM facture f, struct_info si, contrat c WHERE f.fdeppole = si.codsg AND f.soccont = c.soccont AND f.numcont = c.numcont AND f.cav = c.cav &p_where &p_whereenr &p_wherecf GROUP BY si.coddep, si.coddeppole UNION ALL -- 1 Factures enregistrees sans contrat SELECT si.coddep dc_coddep, si.coddeppole dc_coddeppole, count(*) dc_nbenr, 0 dc_nbreg, 0 dc_nbsanscont, 0 dc_nbfactattper, 0 dc_nbfactatt, 0 dc_nbfacannper, 0 dc_facann FROM facture f, struct_info si WHERE f.fdeppole = si.codsg AND f.numcont IS NULL AND f.soccont IS NULL AND f.cav IS NULL &p_whereenr &p_wherecf GROUP BY si.coddep, si.coddeppole UNION ALL -- 2 Factures reglees avec contrat SELECT si.coddep dc_coddep, si.coddeppole dc_coddeppole, 0 dc_nbenr, count(*) dc_nbreg, 0 dc_nbsanscont, 0 dc_nbfactattper, 0 dc_nbfactatt, 0 dc_nbfacannper, 0 dc_facann FROM facture f, struct_info si, contrat c WHERE f.fdeppole = si.codsg AND f.soccont = c.soccont AND f.numcont = c.numcont AND f.cav = c.cav &p_wherereg &p_wherecode8 &p_where &p_wherecf GROUP BY si.coddep, si.coddeppole UNION ALL -- 2 Factures reglees sans contrat SELECT si.coddep dc_coddep, si.coddeppole dc_coddeppole, 0 dc_nbenr, count(*) dc_nbreg, 0 dc_nbsanscont, 0 dc_nbfactattper, 0 dc_nbfactatt, 0 dc_nbfacannper, 0 dc_facann FROM facture f, struct_info si WHERE f.fdeppole = si.codsg AND f.numcont IS NULL AND f.soccont IS NULL AND f.cav IS NULL &p_wherereg &p_wherecode8 &p_wherecf GROUP BY si.coddep, si.coddeppole UNION ALL -- 3 Factures Enregistrees sans contrat SELECT si.coddep dc_coddep, si.coddeppole dc_coddeppole, 0 dc_nbenr, 0 dc_nbreg, count(*) dc_nbsanscont, 0 dc_nbfactattper, 0 dc_nbfactatt, 0 dc_nbfacannper, 0 dc_facann FROM facture f, struct_info si WHERE f.fdeppole = si.codsg AND f.numcont IS NULL AND f.soccont IS NULL AND f.cav IS NULL &p_whereenr &p_wherecode8 &p_wherecf GROUP BY si.coddep, si.coddeppole UNION ALL -- 4 Factures enregistre avec contrat, non reglees SELECT si.coddep dc_coddep, si.coddeppole dc_coddeppole, 0 dc_nbenr, 0 dc_nbreg, 0 dc_nbsanscont, count(*) dc_nbfactattper, 0 dc_nbfactatt, 0 dc_nbfacannper, 0 dc_facann FROM facture f, struct_info si, contrat c WHERE f.fdeppole = si.codsg AND f.soccont = c.soccont AND f.numcont = c.numcont AND f.cav = c.cav AND (f.fregcompta IS NULL OR f.faccsec IS NULL) &p_whereenr &p_where &p_wherecf GROUP BY si.coddep, si.coddeppole UNION ALL -- 4 Factures enregistre sans contrat, non reglees SELECT si.coddep dc_coddep, si.coddeppole dc_coddeppole, 0 dc_nbenr, 0 dc_nbreg, 0 dc_nbsanscont, count(*) dc_nbfactattper, 0 dc_nbfactatt, 0 dc_nbfacannper, 0 dc_facann FROM facture f, struct_info si WHERE f.fdeppole = si.codsg AND f.numcont IS NULL AND f.soccont IS NULL AND f.cav IS NULL AND (f.fregcompta IS NULL OR f.faccsec IS NULL) &p_whereenr &p_wherecf GROUP BY si.coddep, si.coddeppole UNION ALL -- 5 Factures enregistre avec contrat, quelque soit la date et non reglees SELECT si.coddep dc_coddep, si.coddeppole dc_coddeppole, 0 dc_nbenr, 0 dc_nbreg, 0 dc_nbsanscont, 0 dc_nbfactattper, count(*) dc_nbfactatt, 0 dc_nbfacannper, 0 dc_facann FROM facture f, struct_info si, contrat c WHERE f.fdeppole = si.codsg AND (f.fregcompta IS NULL OR f.faccsec IS NULL) AND f.fenrcompta IS NOT NULL AND f.soccont = c.soccont AND f.numcont = c.numcont AND f.cav = c.cav &p_where &p_wherecf GROUP BY si.coddep, si.coddeppole UNION ALL -- 5 Factures enregistre sans contrat, quelue soit la date et non reglees SELECT si.coddep dc_coddep, si.coddeppole dc_coddeppole, 0 dc_nbenr, 0 dc_nbreg, 0 dc_nbsanscont, 0 dc_nbfactattper, count(*) dc_nbfactatt, 0 dc_nbfacannper, 0 dc_facann FROM facture f, struct_info si WHERE f.fdeppole = si.codsg AND f.numcont IS NULL AND f.soccont IS NULL AND f.cav IS NULL AND ( f.fregcompta IS NULL OR f.faccsec IS NULL) AND f.fenrcompta IS NOT NULL &p_wherecf GROUP BY si.coddep, si.coddeppole UNION ALL --6 Factures annulees / periode SELECT si.coddep dc_coddep, si.coddeppole dc_coddeppole, 0 dc_nbenr, 0 dc_nbreg, 0 dc_nbsanscont, 0 dc_nbfactattper, 0 dc_nbfactatt, count(*) dc_nbfacannper, 0 dc_facann FROM facture f, struct_info si, contrat c WHERE f.fdeppole = si.codsg AND f.soccont = c.soccont AND f.numcont = c.numcont AND f.cav = c.cav AND f.fmodreglt = 8 &p_where &p_whereenr &p_wherereg &p_wherecf GROUP BY si.coddep, si.coddeppole UNION ALL -- 6 SELECT si.coddep dc_coddep, si.coddeppole dc_coddeppole, 0 dc_nbenr, 0 dc_nbreg, 0 dc_nbsanscont, 0 dc_nbfactattper, 0 dc_nbfactatt, count(*) dc_nbfacannper, 0 dc_facann FROM facture f, struct_info si WHERE f.fdeppole = si.codsg AND f.numcont IS NULL AND f.soccont IS NULL AND f.cav IS NULL AND f.fmodreglt = 8 &p_wherecf &p_whereenr &p_wherereg GROUP BY si.coddep, si.coddeppole UNION ALL --7 Factures annulees SELECT si.coddep dc_coddep, si.coddeppole dc_coddeppole, 0 dc_nbenr, 0 dc_nbreg, 0 dc_nbsanscont, 0 dc_nbfactattper, 0 dc_nbfactatt, 0 dc_nbfacannper, count(*) dc_facann FROM facture f, struct_info si, contrat c WHERE f.fdeppole = si.codsg AND f.soccont = c.soccont AND f.numcont = c.numcont AND f.cav = c.cav AND f.fmodreglt = 8 &p_where &p_wherereg &p_wherecf GROUP BY si.coddep, si.coddeppole UNION ALL -- 7 SELECT si.coddep dc_coddep, si.coddeppole dc_coddeppole, 0 dc_nbenr, 0 dc_nbreg, 0 dc_nbsanscont, 0 dc_nbfactattper, 0 dc_nbfactatt, 0 dc_nbfacannper, count(*) dc_facann FROM facture f, struct_info si WHERE f.fdeppole = si.codsg AND f.numcont IS NULL AND f.soccont IS NULL AND f.cav IS NULL AND f.fmodreglt = 8 &p_wherecf &p_wherereg GROUP BY si.coddep, si.coddeppole;

summary.name: CS_NbEnr
summary.comment: Somme des valeurs de la colonne dc_NbEnr Pour comprendre, executer la reqete sous sql plus, vous comprendrez pourquoi on fait la somme
